---
title: "Runtime analysis"
output: html_notebook
---
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggthemes)
```

```{r}
exact_data <- read.delim("runtime_exact.txt", header = TRUE, sep = "\t")
approx_data <- read.delim("runtime_approx.txt", header = TRUE, sep = "\t")

approx_data %>% 
  mutate(Ratio = Score / exact_data$Score,
         Runtime_ratio = Runtime / exact_data$Runtime) -> approx_data

max(approx_data$Ratio)
```

```{r}
ggplot(approx_data) + 
  geom_point(aes(x = Sequence_length, y = Ratio)) +
  labs(x = "Sequence length", y = "Ratio [Approx / Exact]") +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 4/3, linetype = 2, color = "darkred") +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(1, 1.4)) +
  theme_clean()

```
